title: Tribunal (still waiting...)
body: Just a question to Riot, I have noticed especially recently more than ever maybe its all the 12vies on school holidays, but as I was saying OCE has to be the most toxic server by far, and to be honest I never knew that there was that many people that could be toxic. Anyhow reporting people is clearly not the answer and i tell people they are reported and I hear something along the lines of "yeah and what tribunal is gonna ban me?" Sadly I have no reply to this as tribunal is still not on OCE. So Riot please work on getting the tribunal up on OCE we don't want more champions. because we don't have fun playing with toxic players so it might be a good idea on concentrating on removing these toxic players from OCE , and getting the tribunal on OCE would definitely not only help get rid or change the behavior of these people, but would also give players the feeling that they have some say in what people they want in OCE. I think once these toxic players are no longer welcome in OCE we will see a lot more happy summoners.

replies.body:
No server has a tribunal, have you even been reading a single post from Riot over the past year?

They are working on a new Tribunal system.

Riot has proven that if someone gets banned they generally change the way they act, and they make a new account its going to be a while until they can enter ranked at level 30 with a minimum of 16 champions.

Hey Acinicus,


I'm sorry you've had to go through some negative games. Don't think that just because there isn't a tribunal that nothing is being done!

Right now we have multiple automatic systems in place to punish negative behaviour; for example

**Live**

* LeaverBuster
* Chat restrictions
* Intentional feeder bans
* Manual audits

**Currently testing**

* Automatic verbal abuse bans

This is of course just the negative stuff, we are also working on ways to promote and recognize positive play within our community as well!
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/celebrating-end-years-snowdown

Our player behavior philosophies include punishment, reform, and positive reinforcement. There's no silver bullet to improving player behavior in online games, and you always need a mix of punishments and rewards. You can read more about our design philosophies here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/exploring-player-behavior-design-values

If you're really interested in player behaviour give this [video](http://gdcvault.com/play/1017940/The-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player) a watch it is Jeffrey "Lyte" Lin talking about "The Science Behind Shaping Player Behavior in Online Games".

Tribunal wont fix anything, it's a free game, they can just make another account and be toxic to new players, which will cause new problems.
It can, if a toxic person's account has a 14 day ban and is close to a perma ban, maybe they'll think twice about losing an account with a few hundred dollars invested in it
Yes, but the toxic person will still be in the community, it won't fix who they are, you can't change the mind of a negative / flaming player through fake internet items.

Yes but if they get perma banned then they have to start from level 1 again, so looking at the odds the chances of u encountering them again is slim to none because I know how painful it is getting from level 1-30 and its not fun ao i doubt any moron would do it unless they have to. So a perma ban means the person will not be in the same game until they hit level 30 and they might change their behaviour knowing punishments are being handed out. For the people who get time bans they may change their behaviour knowing that if they continue acting the way they currently are there is a chance they will get perma banned and have to start from level 1 again. The sooner a tribunal is implemented the better.
yes but then new players would get discouraged by the abusive players who are re-levelling.

"OCE is most toxic server by far'... Have you been on the Turkish or Russian servers? Holy ♥♥♥♥. 
The team that works on player behaviour is completely different to the team that works on champ design.
No server has a tribunal because Riot knows that the current system is flawed and does not work as well as it could. Henceforth, they are trying to make positive incentives for players to follow (IP boost, mystery gift) as well as harsh punishments like the leaver buster.

**So until we do get a tribunal here is what you do:** You report them and block them and get their toxicity out of your mind. If you like, you could even make a list of intentional feeders and a list of people with extra toxicity (the ones that tell you to "kill yourself" or that you were "raped by a family member and that is why you are so noob" and when you get 20 or so names (if OCE is as toxic as you are claiming, it won't take that long) and send it straight to riot support.

Alternatively, you could even ignore them all completely and make a game out of it. I like to play "League bingo"
Set up a bingo card with things like "instalocks mid", "kill yourself", "gg can't carry noob team" etc etc and when you get your card filled up you can eat a piece of candy or something. You will be hella fat in no time ♥

There was nothing wrong with the old tribunal to begin with, and OCE has never had tribunal other servers have had tribunal in the past next time please think before you start talking about stuff you know nothing about, and you don't need the attitude it just unnecessary.
